overview: It was a short relationship. He, who was reading Hamlet in a restaurant meets her, when she comes to him and recites an excerpt from the book. After all, they pass all day long together, him, without knowing her name - not because of the many times he asked her. Two strangers living and having fun, singing the song of their youth, but it still remains one question he wouldn't be able to answer himself: "who would be her?"
title: 200 Minutes of Something I Haven't Felt
